function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for indoor air pollution due to reduced outdoor air supply","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and health issues among building occupants","Mitigation":"Regular air quality monitoring, use of indoor air purification systems, and implementation of ventilation rate standards","Technologies":"Indoor air quality sensors, air purifiers, and HVAC systems with adjustable ventilation rates","People":"Building occupants, especially those in close proximity on the same floor","Owner":"Building management or facility owners"},{"Description":"High occupancy in office areas can lead to easier transmission of contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and outbreaks within the office building","Mitigation":"Implementation of social distancing measures, regular cleaning and disinfection protocols, and promotion of personal hygiene practices","Technologies":"Occupancy management systems, UV-C disinfection devices, and hand hygiene stations","People":"Office workers, especially those in close proximity in the same work area","Owner":"Office management or company executives"},{"Description":"Limited access to natural ventilation due to reduced outdoor air supply","Impact":"Reduced ability to dilute indoor air pollutants and microorganisms, leading to poor indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Installation of mechanical ventilation systems, use of air filtering technologies, and regular maintenance of HVAC systems","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation units, air filtration systems, and smart HVAC controls","People":"Building occupants in areas with reduced outdoor air supply","Owner":"Building management or facility owners"}]}
